entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:20 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moose Creek Wells 9:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
